title: The Best KDP Keyword Software I Use to Get Books Ranked on Amazon

tactics.name: amazon_search
tactics.description: Use Amazon's search bar and suggestions to identify customer search terms and competition levels
steps: Enter a general search term like 'adult coloring book'
Note the number of search results (competition indicator)
Click on suggestions to expand keyword list
source_quotes: Amazon can give us a lot of important information if we know where to look

tactics.name: amz_suggestion_expander
tactics.description: Expand keyword lists using Chrome plugin with Amazon search suggestions
steps: Install free plugin for real-time suggestions
Use Pro version to download keyword spreadsheets
source_quotes: AMZ suggestion Expander Pro gives us the approximate number of Google searches per month

tactics.name: Amazon Search Volume Analysis
tactics.description: Use tools to determine monthly Amazon search volume for keywords
steps: Input keywords into Publisher Rocket or Helium 10
Analyze search volume and competition metrics
caveats: Requires paid subscription for detailed Amazon data
source_quotes: knowing the actual number of searches per month on Amazon for a particular keyword

tactics.name: Start Simple with Keywords
tactics.description: Begin with basic Amazon search tools before advanced keyword software.
steps: Add keywords via AMZ suggestion expander
source_quotes: keep it simple. Just start with the basic Amazon search bar... then start to use those tools

heuristics.name: google_volume_heuristic
heuristics.condition: If a keyword has high Google search volume, it indicates popularity
source_quotes: if you find that keyword does have a lot of Google searches per month, it can give that keyword a bit of extra strength

heuristics.name: Low Review Niche Targeting
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews < 200 then boost niche potential

heuristics.name: Prioritize Tool Consistency
heuristics.condition: If comparing search volume numbers between tools, focus on internal tool data
source_quotes: don't compare the numbers you get from each keyword tool

claims.statement: Keyword research saves time by providing customer search insights before publishing
source_quotes: keyword research saves us a lot of time rather than just publishing a book using trial and error
do have to pay for search credits here for a hundred thousand search credits, it's $1 a month

claims.statement: Keyword tools like Helium 10 and Publisher Rocket use different algorithms for search volume estimates
source_quotes: Helium 10 maybe for adult coloring book says there's 50,000 searches... Publisher Rocket says there's 30,000

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience identities with targeted problems
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Creates focused niche markets with lower competition
source_quotes: we want to find out what customers are actually searching for on Amazon

niche_patterns.description: Combines specific audience identity with unique problems and constraints for niche targeting
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Creates highly specific search terms with lower competition
